hymn.title: Totally
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: To [skip1] -- tal -- ly! To [skip1] -- tal -- ly! Je -- sus Christ is [skip1] to -- tal -- ly for God! (ab -- so -- lute -- ly, yes, He's) To [skip1] -- tal -- ly! To [skip1] -- tal -- ly! Je -- sus Christ is [skip1] to -- tal -- ly for God! In the book of Mark we see Our serv -- ing Lord, Dil -- i -- gent -- ly do -- ing His Fa -- ther's works. For His Fa -- ther's pur -- pose; Not to do His own will, Je -- sus Christ was ab -- so -- lute -- ly for God!
layout.singingstanza2: 2. With -- out a doubt! With -- out a doubt! Je -- sus Christ is with -- out a doubt for God! (not just half -- way but He's) With -- out a doubt! With -- out a doubt! Je -- sus Christ is with -- out a doubt for God!
layout.singingstanza3: 3. I wan -- na be, I wan -- na be Just for God, yes, [skip1] to -- tal -- ly for God! (ut -- ter -- ly, com -- plete -- ly) I wan -- na be, I wan -- na be Just for God, yes, [skip1] to -- tal -- ly for God!
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2012 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: Totally! Totally! Jesus Christ is totally for God! (absolutely, yes, He's) Totally, totally! Jesus Christ is totally for God!
Without a doubt! Without a doubt! Jesus Christ is without a doubt for God! (not just halfway but He's) Without a doubt! Without a doubt! Jesus Christ is without a doubt for God!
I wanna be, I wanna be Just for God, yes, totally for God! (utterly, completely) I wanna be, I wanna be Just for God, yes, totally for God!
In the book of Mark we see Our serving Lord, Diligently doing His Father's works. For His Father's purpose; Not to do His own will, Jesus Christ was absolutely for God!
